Articles.Content: Does anyone else here have a RC Heli? I had one a year ago but now that battery is damaged, so I am going to order a WLtoys v931.
I've had 1 hobbygrade RC heli, a Blade CX2. My area of expertise is fixed wing planes though.

A Nine Eagles Solo Pro 4ch mini-heli.

And an E-sky Belt CP being restored back to airworthiness.

They are borderline hobbygrade, but if I get any good at it, I might buy an Align 450 whirlybird!
A Chronos FP 110 from Ares rc and a Blade nano cpx from Horizon hobby.
